frontmatter.title: I Was Wrong About The Liberal Arts

nodes.excerpt:
To me,
non-fiction >> fiction

…but recently I’ve grown sick of New Content™ about tech, business, & self-help

Ted Talks™
are for Ideas Worth Spreading

This list of mine
is for Links Worth Spreading

"I liked math because it was repeatable & objective
The other subjects were too 'up to interpretation'"

Which sounds most painful?

  • applying for jobs out of reach
  • asking a stranger on a date
  • building a business that alone can sustain you
